full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS GDUGS DKAR MO CAN LA BRTEN NAS BYABS KHRUS BYED TSUL SDUG KUN MUN SEL PHAN BDE RGYAS PA'I 'DAB BRGYA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA GDUGS DKAR MO CAN LA BRTEN BYABS KHRUS BYED TSUL SDUG KUN MUN SEL PHAN BDE RGYAS PA'I 'DAB BRGYA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS RGYAS PA PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I BRGYUD DU BSTAMS PA GSUNGS RAB KUN LA LTA BA'I BLO GROS KYI MIG DANG LDAN PA AER TE NI ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DPAL GRUB KYI 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYAL BA'I MING GIS SBYAR BA, YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO RANG NYID DO, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
